name: Trados TagEditor File
summary: A TTX file is a translated document generated by Trados translation software. It includes tags that define the text formatting and structure of the page. TTX files can be created from .HTML , .JSP , .ASP , .XSL , .XML , .SGML , .RTF , and .DOC documents, as well as several other file types.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
